tool.name: OGS: RemoveUnusedPoints
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'RemoveUnusedPoints'.
tool.command: if [ "$input" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input' '${$input.element_identifier}'; fi; RemoveUnusedPoints --input '$input.element_identifier' --output output_1.gml
tool.help: This tool runs the **RemoveUnusedPoints** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
